body:
Hey guys! 
This thread will be the main thread that I will be using for this new TF2 series that I'm doing!
Basically, if you don't know what this series will be about, click here, or on the link below:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJ87dgUEWpA

Anyways, I'll update this thread whenever I upload a new video!
This will probably be a 9 or 10 episode series, and then I will stop updating this thread.
Hope you all enjoy! ^o^

Episode 1 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8keMNPKV2XU

title: ♦ Porky's TF2 Series! ♦
